reference: Auerbach, A.J., 1983, Taxation, Corporate Financial Policy and the Cost of Capital, Journal of Economic Literature, 21, September, 905-940.

Gordon, R.H. and J.D. Wilson, 1986, Measuring the Efficiency Cost of Taxing Risky Capital Income, NBER Working Paper.
Hendershott, P.H., 1986, Tax Changes and Capital Allocation in the l980s, in Martin Feldstein (ed.) , The Effects of Taxation on Capital Formation, University of Chicago Press.
Hendershott, P.H. and D.C. Ling, 1986, Likely Impacts of the Administration Proposal and the House Bill, in James Follain (ed.), Tax Reform and Real Estate, The Urban Institute.
